                        Life Itself
                      
                      
                        Reclaiming My Inbox, Next
                      
                      I gave up on my email inbox a long time ago. Itâ€™s time I reclaim it.
                      
                        Read More

I dreamed that I was walking down the street with Mila Kunis and we somehow ended up in front of the White House where President Biden was giving Zendaya a medal. Mila said she always wanted to meet Zendaya so I tell her to "just go and talk to her, she's right there." So she does. And somehow I end up chatting with Sir Ian McKellen who makes a joke about the song "Dead Man Walking" by David Bowie, which in my dream made sense and it was funny and witty and I couldn't stop laughing. #dreams

name:
Two Point Campus
I love simulation games and I love academic life. I always knew I'd enjoy Two Point Campus, and now I've been able to try it during their free weekend on #Steam. It's on sale, so I'm getting it! It runs great on the #SteamDeck, though the controls are a bit finicky sometimes.store.steampowered.com/app/164#Gaming #TwoPointCampus #FreeWeekend

name: Well, I couldn't help myself. If I see an Elric story, chances are I'll but it. Even if I read it before.They had a pretty decent copy of Epic Illustrated #14 at Casablanca Comics. It includes the story "While the Gods Laugh" with art by P. Craig Russell. How could I not buy it, at $6?#Comics
content: Well, I couldn't help myself. If I see an Elric story, chances are I'll but it. Even if I read it before.They had a pretty decent copy of Epic Illustrated #14 at Casablanca Comics. name: It's a gorgeous day here in Portland, #Maine today. I'm using my lunch hour to walk around. My destination is the Old Port. There's a comic book shop there I want to check out.#Selfie #SelfieTherapy #GaySelfie #GayMastodon
